title: This Jorge Masvidal bobblehead just might be a super necessary collectible
text:
It’s not often that we’ll just go ahead and basically give away a free advertisement for a product here at The Blue Corner. But when we do, you better be sure it’s a damn cool product.

And that’s exactly what we got here with this awesome Jorge Masvidal bobblehead commemorating his record-breaking flying knee knockout of Ben Askren at UFC 239.

Can you say “super necessary”? Check out this thing made by the folks over at MMABobblehead.com:

Look at that detail. It looks just like him!

Guess it would’ve been too much to ask to include Askren dipping his head right into the knee, but this will work. When we see Masvidal in that pose, we know exactly what it’s about.

Masvidal returns to action next week at UFC 244 against Nate Diaz for the “BMF” title belt Nov. 2 at Madison Square Garden.

The Blue Corner is MMA Junkie’s blog space. We don’t take it overly serious, and neither should you. If you come complaining to us that something you read here is not hard-hitting news, expect to have the previous sentence repeated in ALL CAPS.
description: Jorge Masvidal's record-breaking knockout of Ben Askren has been immortalized forever as a bobblehead.
